prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Description of the music you want to generate

output_format.title: output_format
output_format.description: Audio output format: mp3_standard (128kbps MP3, balanced quality/size), mp3_high_quality (192kbps MP3, higher quality), wav_16khz (16kHz WAV, good for voice), wav_22khz (22kHz WAV), wav_24khz (24kHz WAV), wav_cd_quality (44.1kHz WAV, uncompressed CD quality)

music_length_ms.title: Music Length Ms
music_length_ms.description: Target duration of the music in milliseconds (optional, defaults to ~10 seconds)

force_instrumental.title: Force Instrumental
force_instrumental.description: If true, removes vocal elements from the generated music
